--- title: HW2 authoor: 이재준 date: 2024-0712 categories: - bigdata --- ##144p #1 ::: {#1792e69f .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") df.head df["displ"] #데이터뽑기 low=df.query("displ<=4") #정해진 데이터 뽑기 안됨 조건문만 가능 high=df.query("displ>=5") high["hwy"] print(np.mean(low["hwy"])) print(np.mean(high["hwy"])) np.mean(low["hwy"]) np.mean(low["hwy"]) >=np.mean(high["hwy"]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 25.96319018404908 18.07894736842105 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` np.True_ ``` ::: ::: ##144p #2 ::: {#e997aeeb .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") au=df.query('manufacturer == "audi"') to=df.query('manufacturer == "toyota"') au print(np.mean(au["cty"])) print(np.mean(to["cty"])) np.mean(au["cty"])>=np.mean(to["cty"]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 17.61111111111111 18.529411764705884 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` np.False_ ``` ::: ::: 144 #3 ::: {#ced94f81 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") car=df.query('manufacturer=="chevrolet"' and 'manufacturer == "ford"' and 'manufacturer == "honda"') np.mean(car["hwy"]) #아래까지 가능 car["hwy"].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` np.float64(32.55555555555556) ``` ::: ::: #153 ::: {#36bd3365 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") au=df.query('manufacturer=="audi"') au=au.sort_values(['hwy'],ascending=[True]) au.head(5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ##158p ::: {#420ad51e .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") #1 dfc=df.copy() dfc["add"]=dfc["cty"]+dfc["hwy"] print(dfc.head()) #2 dfc["mean"]=dfc["add"]/2 #3 dfc=dfc.sort_values(['mean'],ascending = [False]) dfc.head(3) #4 df = df.assign( add= lambda x: x["cty"]+x["hwy"], mean= lambda x: x["add"]/2)\ .sort_values('mean',ascending =[False])\ .head() df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category \ 0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact 1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact 2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact 3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact 4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact add 0 47 1 50 2 51 3 51 4 42 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
